languages.text: "Значит, кхм, брак Леди Кассии и Лорд-капитана... Достойный союз двух глав великих династий".
"So, ahem, the marriage of Lady Cassia and the Lord Captain... A worthy union between the heads of two great dynasties."
languages.original_text: "Значит, кхм, брак Леди Кассии и Лорд-капитана... Достойный союз двух глав великих династий".

traits.locale_text: "So, ahem, the marriage of Lady Cassia and the Lord Captain... A worthy union between the heads of two great dynasties."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So, ahem, the marriage of Lady Cassia and the Lord Captain... A worthy union between the heads of two great dynasties."

languages.text: “嗯，咳咳，卡西娅女士与舰长大人的联姻……两个伟大王朝的结盟。”
languages.original_text: "So, ahem, the marriage of Lady Cassia and the Lord Captain... A worthy union between the heads of two great dynasties."

traits.locale_text: “嗯，咳咳，卡西娅女士与舰长大人的联姻……两个伟大王朝的结盟。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Donc, euh, le mariage entre {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et dame Cassia... Deux grandes dynasties qui s'unissent, ce n'est pas rien. »
languages.original_text: "So, ahem, the marriage of Lady Cassia and the Lord Captain... A worthy union between the heads of two great dynasties."

traits.locale_text: « Donc, euh, le mariage entre {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et dame Cassia... Deux grandes dynasties qui s'unissent, ce n'est pas rien. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Bueno, ejem, sobre el matrimonio de lady Cassia y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán... es una unión muy respetable entre l{mf|o|a}s líderes de dos grandes dinastías».
languages.original_text: "So, ahem, the marriage of Lady Cassia and the Lord Captain... A worthy union between the heads of two great dynasties."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, ejem, sobre el matrimonio de lady Cassia y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán... es una unión muy respetable entre l{mf|o|a}s líderes de dos grandes dinastías».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「それで、カシア様とロード・キャプテンのご婚姻は…2つの偉大な王朝のトップによる価値ある結びつきですな」
languages.original_text: "So, ahem, the marriage of Lady Cassia and the Lord Captain... A worthy union between the heads of two great dynasties."

traits.locale_text: 「それで、カシア様とロード・キャプテンのご婚姻は…2つの偉大な王朝のトップによる価値ある結びつきですな」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Also, ähem, die Ehe zwischen Lady Cassia und dem Lord Captain ... Eine würdige Vereinigung zwischen den Köpfen der beiden großen Dynastien."
languages.original_text: "So, ahem, the marriage of Lady Cassia and the Lord Captain... A worthy union between the heads of two great dynasties."

traits.locale_text: "Also, ähem, die Ehe zwischen Lady Cassia und dem Lord Captain ... Eine würdige Vereinigung zwischen den Köpfen der beiden großen Dynastien."

languages.original_text: "So, ahem, the marriage of Lady Cassia and the Lord Captain... A worthy union between the heads of two great dynasties."

languages.text: "Şimdi... Leydi Cassia ve Lord Kaptan evleniyor. İki hanedanlığın da şanına yaraşır bir birliktelik."
languages.original_text: "So, ahem, the marriage of Lady Cassia and the Lord Captain... A worthy union between the heads of two great dynasties."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, şimdi, Leydi Cassia ve Lord Kaptan evleniyor... İki hanedanlığın da şanına yaraşır bir birliktelik."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
